name: JobSecurity
title: Job Security
description: Assessment of the likelihood of the patient to lose job or be laid off, and determination of ease of re-employment (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Job Security.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the likelihood of the patient to lose job or be laid off, and determination of ease of re-employment.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Job Security.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Job Security.)

contains.display: I am concerned about keeping my job - include work at home - in the past 7 days [FACIT]
